SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.colinalworth.celltable.columns.client
Annotation Type Columns.Editable

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public static @interface Columns.Editable

Marks the Column as Editable, so a FieldUpdater will be created and used to call the matching set method for the property this column is assigned to. Will not work for @Path(""). Nested paths are supported. There is a known issue in GWT (http://code.google.com/p/google-web-toolkit/issues/detail?id=5981) where a CellTable attached to an Editor through HasDataFlushableEditor cannot have values changed. This annotation does nothing to help with the issue. This can also be applied to the entire type

Optional Element Summary
 Class<? extends com.google.gwt.cell.client.FieldUpdater> value
          If a FieldUpdater type is specified, @Path and @ConvertedWith will be ignored when data is being saved - the specified type must handle all of this.
 

value

public abstract Class<? extends com.google.gwt.cell.client.FieldUpdater> value
If a FieldUpdater type is specified, @Path and @ConvertedWith will be ignored when data is being saved - the specified type must handle all of this. Specified instance will be created with GWT.create().

Default:
com.google.gwt.cell.client.FieldUpdater.class
